mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT (id) FROM t_w_use_water_plan ta inner join (SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{userId} GROUP BY unit_type_code) tb on SUBSTRING ( ta.unit_code, 5, 2 ) = tb.unit_type_code
inner JOIN (SELECT id AS unit_id FROM t_w_use_water_unit WHERE industry = #{industry})tc ON ta.use_water_unit_id=tc.unit_id
and unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'
and unit_name like '%${unitName}%'
and water_meter_code like '%${waterMeterCode}%'
and plan_year >= #{yearStart}
and plan_year <= #{yearEnd}

SELECT t1.id,t1.node_code AS nodeCode,t1.use_water_unit_id AS useWaterUnitId,t1.unit_name AS unitName,t1.unit_code AS unitCode, t1.water_meter_code AS waterMeterCode,t1.plan_year AS planYear, t1.cur_year_plan AS curYearPlan,t1.first_quarter AS firstQuarter,t1.second_quarter AS secondQuarter, t1.third_quarter AS thirdQuarter,t1.fourth_quarter AS fourthQuarter, t1.plan_type AS planType, CONVERT(varchar(100), t1.create_time, 23) AS updateTime,t1.printed AS printed,t1.status AS status, t1.remarks AS remarks FROM t_w_use_water_plan_add t1 WHERE t1.node_code =#{nodeCode} AND t1.unit_code =#{unitCode} AND t1.plan_year =#{planYear} ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC

SELECT t1.id,t1.node_code,t1.use_water_unit_id,t1.unit_name,t1.unit_code, t1.water_meter_code,t1.plan_year,t1.minus_pay_status,t1.balance_test, t1.create_type,t1.cur_year_plan,t1.first_quarter,t1.second_quarter, t1.third_quarter,t1.fourth_quarter, '当前计划' AS plan_type,COALESCE (t1.update_time,t1.create_time) AS update_time,t1.remarks,t1.printed FROM t_w_use_water_plan t1 WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM t_w_use_water_plan WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} AND SUBSTRING(unit_code,5,2) IN ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT 'NO_THIS_CODE' AS unit_type_code )
and unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'
and unit_name like '%${unitName}%'
and water_meter_code like '%${waterMeterCode}%'
and plan_year >= #{yearStart}
and plan_year <= #{yearEnd}
UNION ALL SELECT 'NO_THIS_ID' AS id) ORDER BY t1.unit_code ASC

SELECT t1.use_water_unit_id,t1.unit_code,t1.unit_name,COALESCE(t1.water_meter_code,'') AS water_meter_code,t1.plan_year,t1.cur_year_plan, COALESCE(t1.first_quarter,0) AS first_quarter,COALESCE(t1.second_quarter,0) AS second_quarter,COALESCE(t1.third_quarter,0) AS third_quarter, COALESCE(t1.fourth_quarter,0) AS fourth_quarter,minus_pay_status,balance_test,create_type, COALESCE((SELECT sum(COALESCE(water_number,0)) FROM t_w_water_use_data WHERE use_month=#{thisMonth} AND use_year =#{thisMonthYear} AND use_water_unit_id =t1.use_water_unit_id GROUP BY use_water_unit_id ),0) AS first_water, COALESCE((SELECT sum(COALESCE(water_number,0)) FROM t_w_water_use_data WHERE use_month=#{monthBefore} AND use_year =#{monthBeforeYear} AND use_water_unit_id =t1.use_water_unit_id GROUP BY use_water_unit_id ),0) AS second_water FROM t_w_use_water_plan t1 WHERE id IN ( SELECT id FROM t_w_use_water_plan WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} AND SUBSTRING(unit_code,5,2) IN ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT 'NO_THIS_CODE' AS unit_type_code ) UNION ALL SELECT 'NO_THIS_ID' AS id) AND plan_year = (SELECT MAX (plan_year) FROM t_w_use_water_plan WHERE use_water_unit_id =t1.use_water_unit_id)
and unit_code like '%${unitCode}%'

select unit_code as unitCode, unit_name as unitName, count_quarter as countQuarter, count_year as countYear from t_w_water_use_pay_info where use_water_unit_id=#{use_water_unit_id} and pay_status != '1' and pay_status != '5' order by count_year desc,count_quarter desc

SELECT uu.unit_code, MAX (m.water_meter_code) AS water_meter_code, uu.unit_name, p.plan_year, p.cur_year_plan, p.first_quarter, p.second_quarter, p.third_quarter, p.fourth_quarter, CONVERT(varchar(100), p.update_time, 23) as update_time, MAX ('当前计划') AS plan_type, p.remarks FROM t_w_use_water_unit uu, t_w_use_water_plan p, t_w_use_water_unit_meter m WHERE uu.id = p.use_water_unit_id AND uu.id = m.use_water_unit_id AND uu.id IN (SELECT id FROM t_w_use_water_unit WHERE node_code = #{nodeCode} AND SUBSTRING(unit_code,5,2) IN ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT 'NO_THIS_CODE' AS unit_type_code ) ) AND p.plan_year = #{planYear} AND p.plan_type = '0' group by uu.unit_code,uu.unit_name,p.plan_year,p.cur_year_plan,p.first_quarter, p.second_quarter,p.third_quarter,p.fourth_quarter,p.update_time,p.remarks order by uu.unit_code
